name: fabric-delete
title: Fabric Delete
description: This activity deletes a state and/or composite keys from fabric ledger or private data collection
author: Yueming Xu

settings.name: compositeKeys
settings.description: composite keys to be deleted and corresponding field names in a map[string][]string, e.g. {index1: [attr1,attr2]} (Note: if state key does not match the value of the last attribute of an index, the state-key will be appended to the end of the index)

settings.name: keysOnly
settings.description: Delete specified composite keys only, not the state.

inputs.name: data
inputs.description: keys or JSON objects that specify query parameters

inputs.name: privateCollection
inputs.description: name of private collection, or blank if not private data

outputs.name: message
outputs.description: serialized JSON string of the deleted records, or error message

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: keys and JSON object values corresponding to the delted states or composite keys
